Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Snake
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Placeable, Renderable

    public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
implements Placeable, Renderable
    Defines a snake as a list of Points that are linked.
    Author:
    nicholasadamou

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves the snake around the grid based off of the direction it is moving. Handles the conditions were the snake overlaps with its self, hits the bounds of the grid or it eats a fruit.
